document.docAuthor: Hernández-Orts, Jesús S., Kuchta, Roman, Semenas, Liliana, Crespo, Enrique A., González, Raúl A. & Aznar, Francisco J.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated list of the Acanthocephala from Argentina

heading.emphasis:
Profilicollis chasmagnathi ( Holcman-Spector, Mané-Garzón & Dei-Cas, 1977 ) Amin, 1992
( nec Holcman-

subSubSection.paragraph:
Micropogonias furnieri (Desmarest)
( Perciformes , Sciaenidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Odontesthes argentinensis (Valenciennes)
( Atheriniformes , Atherinopsidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Paralichthys orbignyanus (Valenciennes)
( Pleuronectiformes , Paralichthyidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Pogonias cromis (Linnaeus)
( Perciformes , Sciaenidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37°32’S , 57°19’W ). R: Alarcos and Etchegoin (2010) .

Fulica armillata Vieillot
( Gruiformes , Rallidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon. R: Vizcaíno (1989) . C: voucher (MLP-He accession numbers not provided).

Larus atlanticus Olrog
( Charadriiformes , Laridae ). SI : intestine. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : island of the port ( 38º48’S , 62º15’W ), Bahía Blanca Estuary. R: La Sala and Martorelli (2007) ,
La Sala et al. (2013)
. C: voucher (MLP-He 5641).

Larus dominicanus Lichtenstein
( Charadriiformes , Laridae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Chubut Province : coast of Valdés Peninsula and adjacent areas (42°05’– 42°53’S , 64°21’– 65°04’W ), Fracasso Beach ( 42°25’S , 64°07’W ), Puerto Madryn Beach ( 42°47’S , 65°02’W ). R: Diaz (2006) ,
Diaz et al. (2011)
,
Lorenti et al . (2018)
. C: vouchers (CNP-PAR 19; MLP-He 6312). DNA sequences: partial sequences for the cox 1 ( MG859265 , MG859266 ).

Plegadis chihi (Vieillot)
( Pelecaniformes , Threskiornithidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon. R: Vizcaíno (1989) . C: voucher MLP-He accession numbers not provided).

Rollandia rolland
( Podicipediformes , Podicipedidae ). SI: intestine. SD: adult. L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon. R: Vizcaíno (1989) . C: voucher (MLP-He accession numbers not provided).

Sympterygia bonapartii Müller & Henle
( Rajiformes ; Arhynchobatidae ). SI: spiral valve. SD: cystacanth. L: Buenos Aires Province : Bahía Blanca ( 38°45’S , 62°15’W ). R:
Tanzola et al. (1998)
.

Note. Smallnose fanskates were reported as
Sympterygia bonapartei
. These acanthocephalans were reported as
Polymorphus chasmagnathi
by
Tanzola et al. (1998)
.

Cyrtograpsus altimanus Rathbun
( Decapoda , Varunidae ). SI: unknown. SD: cystacanth. L: Chubut Province : Cuevas Cape ( 42.4ºS , 65.2ºW ), Puerto Madryn. R:
Rodríguez et al. (2017)
,
Lorenti et al . (2018)
. DNA sequences: partial sequences for the cox 1 ( KY292510 – KY292512 ).

Cyrtograpsus angulatus Dana
( Decapoda , Varunidae ). SI: coelom, hindgut; SD: cystacanth; L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37º46’S , 57º27’W ), Bahía Blanca Estuary ( 38º44’S , 62º22’W ). R: Martorelli (1989) , La Sala and Martorelli (2007) ,
Alda et al. (2011)
,
La Sala et al. (2012)
,
Casariego et al. (2016)
(see note below).

Neohelice granulata (Dana)
( Decapoda , Varunidae ). SI: hindgut; SD: cystacanth; L: Buenos Aires Province : Mar Chiquita Lagoon ( 37º46’S , 57º27’W ), Bahía Blanca Estuary ( 38º44’S , 62º22’W ). R: La Sala and Martorelli (2007) ,
Alda et al. (2011)
,
La Sala et al. (2012)
,
Casariego et al. (2016)
.

Note. Acanthocephalans reported as
Falsifilicollis chasmagnathi
by Martorelli (1989) .

Mammalia
Otaria flavescens Shaw
( Carnivora , Otariidae ). SI: intestine. SD: juvenile. L: Chubut Province : northern Patagonia (40º43’– 43º20’S , 63º04’– 65º07’W ). R: Hernández-Orts et al. (2013, 2015).
